ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la gÿo n gyá Yǒonshûa nùŋepwɔʼ welÿò, á tyé mvfò cÿɔ́ʼ Ssé. Sátà tyé na gwoŋó pwó Yǒonshûa yetʉ̀ ńne ńdaʼa yé.
en: Then he showed me the high priest Joshua   standing before the angel of the Lord,  # 3:1 Gn 16:7–13; 21:17; 22:11–16; 31:11–13 with Satan  # 3:1 Or the accuser,# 3:1 1Ch 21:1; Jb 1:6–12; Rv 12:10 standing at his right side to accuse him.

ngiemboon: Cÿɔ́ʼ Ssé gɔɔn mbwó nyìŋ gẅie à laʼa yé ngie: «Á poŋ ngie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a jÿɔ́ʼ ncwò gú mbà Sátà, oon Cʉ̀apʉ̀a jÿɔ́ʼ ncwò gú, á yé gẅie à ka kaŋa Yelúzálèm! Tà Yǒonshûa te gwɔ́ pɔ́ páʼ tsemé nkẅíŋ gie mé tsibé mmɔ̌g wɔ́ɔ?»
en: The Lord    said to Satan, “The Lord rebuke you, Satan! May the Lord who has chosen Jerusalem rebuke you! Isn’t this man a burning stick snatched from the fire? ”  # 3:2 Dt 4:20; Am 4:11

ngiemboon: Á la gwaa gwɔ́, Yǒonshûa tyé mvfò cÿɔ́ʼ Ssé, ḿmaʼ menzsǒ mie ncÿǒ ée mǒ.
en: Now Joshua was dressed with filthy   clothes  # 3:3 Dt 23:13; Is 4:4 as he stood before the angel.  # 3:3 Lv 22:3

ngiemboon: Cÿɔ́ʼ Ssé gɔɔn mbwó pʉ̀a pie é la tyé mvfò yé ngie: Pi sẅɛ́ menzsǒ mie ée na yé, ńgwɔ́ ncÿǒ ncÿǒ. Ńgíŋ ńgɔɔn né Yǒonshûa ngie: «Líe ńgyá páʼ n ge kẅile lɔ̌ʼ gie áa na gù, é maʼ menzsǒ línɔ̀ɔn na gù.»
en: So the angel of the Lord    spoke to those  # 3:4 = the angels standing before him, “Take off his filthy clothes! ” Then he said to him, “See, I have removed your iniquity from you,  # 3:4 2Sm 24:10; Jb 7:21; Mc 7:18 and I will clothe you with festive robes.”

ngiemboon: Cÿɔ́ʼ Ssé leen ńké ńgíŋ ńgɔɔn ngie mé kwɛ́ɛ mmó nzsǒ gie á ne ńdʉ́ate twó Yǒonshûa! Mè kwɛ́ɛ mmó nzsǒ mbòŋo á twó yé, ḿbiŋ ḿmaʼ menzsǒ mie é ne síi, á na yé. cÿɔ́ʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la gwɔ́ pɔ́ jʉʼó.
en: Then I said, “Let them put a clean turban   on his head.” So a clean turban was placed on his head, and they clothed him in garments while the angel of the Lord was standing nearby.

ngiemboon: cÿɔ́ʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a leen ńké ńkẅé yɔ̀ɔn ntáŋ, á mvfò Yǒonshûa ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: Then the angel of the Lord charged Joshua,

ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a gẅie à piʼi kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ ne ńgɔɔn ngie:
en: “This is what the Lord of Armies says: If you walk in my ways and keep my mandates, you will both rule my house and take care of my courts; I will also grant you access among these who are standing here.
“Listen, High Priest Joshua, you and your colleagues sitting before you; indeed, these men are a sign that I am about to bring my servant, the Branch.

ngiemboon: Á nue wɔɔn aa tóon gẅie n tÿɔgɔ́ mvfò Yǒonshûa,
en: Notice the stone   I have set before Joshua; on that one stone are seven eyes.  # 3:9 Zch 4:10 I will engrave an inscription on it” #— #this is the declaration of the Lord of Armies #— #“and I will take away the iniquity of this land in a single day.

ngiemboon: Á ge láʼ gwɔ́ lyɛ̌ʼ ŋwɛ́,
en: On that day, each of you will invite his neighbor to sit under his vine and fig tree.”   This is the declaration of the Lord of Armies.
